3. I then compare the "chassis" value from each team with "Dallara".
4. If any team does NOT have a "Dallara" chassis, it would contradict the claim that "only 1 of the teams use a Dallara chassis".
5. On the other hand, if all teams have a "Dallara" chassis, then the claim is false because there are more than one team with a Dallara chassis.
